00056 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00057     uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *fullname, const char *hosttarget, uint16_t port,
00058     uint16_t txtLen, const unsigned char *txtRecord, void *context )
00059 {
00060     SimpleString FullName;
00061
00062     if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00063         return;
00064
00065     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)context;
00066
00067     FullName = fullname;
00068     FullName.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
00069
00070     DnsSdService ServiceInfo( FullName, ntohs(port), hosttarget );
00071     ServiceInfo.Properties.ImportTXTRecord( txtLen, txtRecord );
00072     MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, flags | kDNSServiceFlagsAdd );
00073 }
00074
00075
00076 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00077     uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *serviceName, const char *replyType,
00078     const char *replyDomain, void *context )
00079 {
00080     if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00081         return;
00082
00083     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)context;
00084
00085     if ( flags & kDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00086     {
00087         // A new service in the list, resolve it to see if it is the searched one...
00088         DNSServiceRef Ref;
00089
00090         if ( DNSServiceResolve( &Ref, 0, interfaceIndex, serviceName, replyType, replyDomain, (DNSServiceResolveReply)SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply, context ) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00091         {
00092             DNSServiceProcessResult( Ref );
00093             DNSServiceRefDeallocate( Ref );
00094         }
00095     }
00096     else
00097     {
00098         DnsSdService ServiceInfo( serviceName, replyType, replyDomain, 1 );
00099         MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, flags );
00100     }
00101 }

00103 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::Run()
00104 {
00105     ::timeval timeout;
00106     fd_set fds;
00107     int nReady;
00108     int MaxDesc = 0;    // Maximal descriptor for the select function
00109     DNSServiceRef Ref;
00110     SOCKET DNSSocket;
00111
00112     if ( DNSServiceBrowse(&Ref,0,0,RegType.GetStr(),"",SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply,this) != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00113     {
00114         return;
00115     }
00116
00117     DNSSocket = DNSServiceRefSockFD( Ref );
00118
00119     while(!StopPending())
00120     {
00121         // Set the fd set to an empty set
00122         FD_ZERO(&fds);
00123         FD_SET( DNSSocket, &fds );
00124
00125         // Set or reset the timeout value (select may have change it)
00126         timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00127         timeout.tv_usec = 10000;    // 10 ms
00128
00129 #ifndef WIN32
00130         MaxDesc = DNSSocket + 1;
00131 #else
00132         // On WIN32 plateform, the value is unused and remain 0
00133 #endif
00134 
00135         nReady = select(MaxDesc, &fds, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00136
00137         // If our only socket is readable...
00138         if ( nReady > 0 )
00139         {
00140             // ... process the result
00141             DNSServiceProcessResult(Ref);
00142         }
00143     }
00144
00145     DNSServiceRefDeallocate( Ref );
00146 }

00148 void BrowseForDNSSDService::Start()
00149 {
00150     if ( ! IsRunning() )
00151     {
00152         StartThread();
00153     }

00156 void BrowseForDNSSDService::CallbackClient(DnsSdService& DnsSdService, const DNSServiceFlags flags )
00157 {
00158     CallBack( DnsSdService, flags, UserData );
